channel.title: TrailingStop on DWongResearch Blog
channel.description: Recent content in TrailingStop on DWongResearch Blog

item.title: Trailing Stops in Various AutoCorrelation and Volatility Regimes
item.description: Abstract: I examine trailing stops in real markets and various autocorrelation and volatility regimes using synthetic data. Exits are notoriously under-studied and may be a source of edge. I examine three key hypotheses using my take on Tom Basso’s random entry method to remove entry from the equation.
